titleInfo.title: Letter from Samuel Manesty and Harford Jones, at Bussora [Basra], to Charles Watkins, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter discusses a number of subjects:the availability and price of Carmenia [Kirmān] wool at Basra and Bushire;there is mention of peace between the British and the French [the Eden Treaty?]a request for passage to Bombay for Colonel James Hartley, travelling from England, to be secured;advice that pilots for the journey to Basra should be procured from Kharg Island rather than Bushire as their knowledge of the river [Shaṭṭ al-‘Arab] is superior.
